a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: Oh dear... Why is the mist at the Misty Lake purple today? There must be some suspicious agenda behind it...

a1.speaker: Ayaka:
a1.dialogue: Ah, an intruder who breaks the holy silence of katharsis.

a2.speaker: Ayaka:
a2.dialogue: Even though I or the Almighty would not forgive your actions, in conformity with the virtue of Love, I should not smite her.

a3.speaker: Reimu:
a3.dialogue: Excuse me, who are you, and what did you just say?

a4.speaker: Ayaka:
a4.dialogue: I'm Ayaka Takajima, a Mystic of the Modern World.

a5.speaker: Ayaka:
a5.dialogue: This world is too sinful for a person destined for a life devoted to the union of God like me.

a6.speaker: Ayaka:
a6.dialogue: So, transcending humanity that is mystically unifying with God is the only way for me to escape this world.

a7.speaker: Reimu:
a7.dialogue: Uh, it's all Greek to me. Besides, we Shintoists do not believe in all those heebie-jeebies.

a8.speaker: Reimu:
a8.dialogue: You must be a person from the Myouren Temple or one of those 'heretics' I met earlier.

a9.speaker: Reimu:
a9.dialogue: I sense something fishy about you guys.

a10.speaker: Reimu:
a10.dialogue: You must be the ones who set up the concert to steal our local bands' audience.

a11.speaker: Ayaka:
a11.dialogue: What!? Th... thou... call me such a pure and holy person a heretic! Fie! Then fire and brimstone should be upon thee!
